title: Openbucks

replies.body:
Yes, OpenBucks has an option to combine multiple cards into one value. If you don't see the option in the shop, let me know!

http://puu.sh/qs05s/673213b066.png
I stand corrected!  The Openbucks page will have an option to add another card.  Thanks Wuks!
Thanks for the responses. They were really helpful.

Each RP or gift card would need to be submitted individually.  RP codes can't be stacked under a single transaction.  It may take a little time to input it all, but it's in the best interest in case there are any issues with the transaction.  If you have any questions about purchases, our billing team is happy to help out via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Hope that helps!
